description:
Shared IP groups has been removed from the v1.1 API. We need to update nova so that v1.1 requests can no longer access this controller.

NOTE: shared IPs has been replaced by affinity ID for v1.1 (currently unimplemented)
title: OSAPI: remove shared_ip_groups from the v1.1 API

comments.content:
Shared IP groups has been removed from the v1.1 API. We need to update nova so that v1.1 requests can no longer access this controller.

NOTE: shared IPs has been replaced by affinity ID for v1.1 (currently unimplemented)
